response.overview: Big cars, parties and booze, it’s the daily life of Louis, 25.  Tired of his son’s “little rich kid” behaviour, Jean- François, CEO of a luxury hotel group, decides to go the hard-way: he creates a 19th century Truman Show in which his son wakes up as a miserable valet. Lights, camera, action: everything is set up to teach him a lesson. Unfortunately, nothing goes as planned...
response.tagline: What do you do when your obnoxious playboy son is so out of control that his over-the-top partying threatens to ruin your luxury hotel empire? Obviously, you endeavour to teach him some humility.
response.title: KING OF MY CASTLE
